blessing.beast: 8-again animal ken and free specialty; glamour adds to presence and composure
blessing.darkling: Spend glamour for Wits, Subterfuge, Stealth; 9-again Stealth
blessing.elemental: Spend glamour to add Wyrd to Health for scene 1/day
blessing.fairest: Spend glamour for Presence, Manip, Persuasion pools; no untrained penalty for Social skills
blessing.ogre: Spend glamour for Str, Brawl, Intimidate pools
blessing.wizened: Spend glamour for 9-again Dex for scene OR add Wyrd to Dodge for scene
blessing.broadback: Spend glamour for +2 to Stamina dice pools for the scene
blessing.steepscrambler: +3 to climb; can climb any surface
blessing.swimmerskin: Hold breath for 30min; swim at full speed
blessing.venombite: Touch attack delivers poison, toxicity of Wyrd
blessing.windwing: Spend glamour to glide for one min/Wyrd; max 1B/15yd fall; no Lethal < 150yd
blessing.cleareyes: +2 to hallmark sense; spend 1 glamour to sense superlatively well for 1 rnd (WM 67)
blessing.coldscale: +1 on Composure to resist emotional manipulation; +2 to Stamina rolls to biological venoms/poisons (WM 67)
blessing.roteater: +2 to resist poison/disease, becomes +3 vs ingestion; 9-again on perception to scrounge (WM 67)
blessing.truefriend: Spend glamour and speak to grant +3 to ally in sight (WM 67)
blessing.chimera: Spend glamour for +3 to all Social rolls vs Hobgoblins (WM 107)
blessing.coyote: Willpower gives +5 on Persuasion and Subterfuge; buy Manip at reduced rate with vice gluttony, greed, lust (WM 107)
blessing.nix: 1/day spend glamour to penalize listerners' Social rolls by Wyrd/2 (WM 107)
blessing.riddleseeker: Spend glamour for +2 to non-perception Wits rolls; free Investigation in Riddles (NH:GF 102)
blessing.antiquarian: 9-again on academics, investigation; spend glamour for Encyclopedic Knowledge
blessing.gravewight: Spend glamour to see ghosts for scene
blessing.leechfinger: Spend glamour and touch attack to deal one Lethal and heal one Lethal, or downgrade Agg 1/scene/wyrd
blessing.mirrorskin: Change features at will: +3 to Wits+Subterfuge disguises in mien and mask
blessing.tunnelgrub: Spend glamour to fit through small spaces with Dex+Athletics
blessing.lurkglider: Spend glamour to fall 100yd w/o damage; +2 to balance on small footholds (WM 71)
blessing.moonborn: 1/day spend glamour, make touch atk, to give derangement to self and target (WM 72)
blessing.nightsinger: Free Performance specialty; sing or play instrument to hypnotize listerners (WM 72)
blessing.palewraith: Spend glamour for +1 defense for scene in shadows, works vs firearms (WM 72)
blessing.razorhand: Free Knives specialty; spend glamour to make fists deal 1L (WM 72)
blessing.whisperwisp: 9-again on Empathy and Subterfuge for conversation and gathering info; spend glamour to whisper message to target in earshot (WM 72)
blessing.illes: 1/day spend glamour for Striking Looks 4 and +2 to Social rolls vs opposite sex (WM 107)
blessing.pishacha: 1/wk spend glamour and touch attack to inflict mild derangement for a week (WM 107)
blessing.skogsra: Spend glamour and stare into animal's eyes to make them a pet for the day (WM 108)
blessing.airtouched: 1 glamour to add Wyrd to Speed or Init for scene
blessing.earthbones: Spend glamour for non-combat Strength pools
blessing.snowskin: 9-again on intimidate and subterfuge; 1 glamour to re-roll intimidate
blessing.waterborn: Spend glamour to breathe underwater in place of air and swim at 2x speed for scene, spend glamour to cancel
blessing.woodblood: 9-again on Stealth, Survival; spend glamour to hide in any foliage
blessing.blightbent: +3 to resist man-made toxin/poison; 1/day Dex+Wyrd-Stam to deal 1L/success (WM 78)
blessing.levinquick: Spend glamour for +2 on Speed and Init for 1 rnd/Wyrd (WM 79)
blessing.metalflesh: 1/day spend glamour for +1 on Stam, Resolve, Composure for the scene (WM 79)
blessing.sandharrowed: +2 to establish grapple, overpower, or escape grapple (WM 79)
blessing.apsaras: Spend glamour to make target's vice Lust for 24h and gain Wyrd to manipulation rolls against them (WM 108)
blessing.ask-wee-da-eed: Spend glamour to force reroll of successful roll at -1; +1 to activate Hearth (WM 108)
blessing.di-cang: Spend glamour and all within 10yd ignore wound penalties; buy Larceny at half cost (WM 108)
blessing.bright one: Create stationary light at will; spend glamour to create painfully intense light; -2 to hit when near that intense light
blessing.dancer: 9-again on expression and socialize with agility; +1 dodge
blessing.draconic: +1 brawl; spend glamour to re-roll brawl 1/scene
blessing.flowering: 9-again on persuasion, socialize, subterfuge from fragrance
blessing.muse: Spend glamour to give human +2 expression, persuasion, socialize, subterfuge
blessing.flamesiren: 1/scene spend glamour for flame aura, viewers take -2 on all actions without (WM 84)
blessing.polychromatic: Spend glamour for +2 vs emotional manipulation; empathy rolls against them suffer -1 (WM 84)
blessing.shadowsoul: Add Wyrd to Intimidate; 9-again on Subterfuge; Contracts of Darkness are affinity (WM 84)
blessing.telluric: Sense local time; +3 to actions that need precise timing; free Astronomy (Academics) and Astrology (Occult) specialties (WM 84)
blessing.treasured: 1/scene spend glamour to re-roll failed resistance roll (WM 85)
blessing.gandharva: Spend glamour for exceptional success on 3 with Expression and Persuasion (WM 109)
blessing.succubus: +1 on Social rolls vs targets that share your vice (+2 if Lust); free Sriking Looks 2 (WM 109)
blessing.weisse frau: 1/chapter spend glamour and kiss to grant 2 armor or 3 for child, does not stack (WM 109)
blessing.minstrel: Spend glamour to reroll failed Expression dice; 8-again to get glamour from emotions of audience (NH:GF 43)
blessing.romancer: Others take -3 to describe appearance or identify from footage (NH:GF 46)
blessing.larcenist: 9-again on Larceny and Socialize using agility; +1 Dodge (NH:GF 63)
blessing.playmate: +2 when leading teamwork roll; when not leading, can forego roll to give 9-again or improve existing 9-again to 8-again (NH:GF 122)
blessing.farwalker: 9-again stealth, survival; spend glamour to re-take stealth or survival
blessing.gargantuan: Spend glamour to add Wyrd to Size for scene 1/day (incl temp health; returning deals 1L)
blessing.gristlegrinder: 2L Bite attack as grappling overpower maneuver
blessing.stonebones: Spend glamour to make Wyrd armor for scene
blessing.waterdweller: Hold breath for 30min; see clearly underwater
blessing.bloodbrute: Spend glamour to improvise any melee weapon w/o damage penalty (WM 90)
blessing.corpsegrinder: +1 atk vs undead and enemies below half health (WM 90)
blessing.render: Ignore 3 durability when damaging objects with bare hands (WM 91)
blessing.witchtooth: Spend glamour for Occult; +1 on contracts that involve cursing another person (WM 91)
blessing.daitya: Spend glamour to ignore target durability for one atk; free Weaponry specialty (WM 109)
blessing.oni: 1/chapter spend glamour and bite attack heals 1L or 2B, only against morality 6 or less (WM 110)
blessing.troll: Spend glamour to add Strength to one Manipulation roll (WM 110)
blessing.artist: 8-again Craft; Spend glamour to re-roll failed Craft dice
blessing.brewer: 1/scene touch container 1pt roll wits+crafts. On success spend glamour get potency of Wyrd+successes
blessing.chatelaine: 9-again on Social skills for manners, etiquette, social practice even using Presence; Spend glamour +2 Manip, Presence for scene
blessing.chirurgeon: 9-again on Medicine; no penalties from equipment; provides Hospital ICU care
blessing.smith: Spend glamour for extended Dex+Craft: 4 successes give +1 to item for day; max three uses per item
blessing.soldier: Always has weaponry specialty for every edged weapon
blessing.author: 8-again to Expression with writing or wordyness; Wits+Academics to understand meaning written in any mortal language (WM 96)
blessing.drudge: 9-again to Stealth; spend glamour to cut time for simple tasks by Wyrd+1 (WM 96)
blessing.gameplayer: Spend glamour to win mental game; +3 to gamble using mix of chance and skill (WM 96)
blessing.miner: Spend glamour to tap out message 1 mile/wyrd (WM 96)
blessing.gremlin: 1/day spend glamour and touch object to remove equipment bonus/damage rating (WM 110)
blessing.pamarindo: Spend glamour and touch raw meat to feed one person/wyrd; free Iron Stomach merit (WM 110)
blessing.thusser: Spend glamour and sing/play instrument to hypnotize target (WM 110)
blessing.fatemaker: Spend 2 glamour on talecrafting to avoid cruel twist of fate (SaD 66)

curse.darkling: -1 to daytime contracts, -2 if sun visible
curse.elemental: No 10-again on Manip, Empathy, Expression, Persuasion, Socialize (except affinity contracts)
curse.ogre: No 10-again on composure except perception; -1 composure used as a defense trait
